name: Meme Tensei
description:
you go to a mysterious town where you discover another parallel world full of memes to capture. arm your team with the best attack techniques and discover the great mystery of the disappearance of humans on earth!

NOTE:

the game contains animated violence and sounds that may be inappropriate for the public!

the development of the game engine is ready, we still need to complete the story. It will be available for PC and Android.

to move: arrow keys keyboard.

press OK with the mouse to pass text.

in battle: just touch your meme and choose which ability you want to use on your turn.
